00029 /*
00030 LC_CTYPE        0
00031 LC_NUMERIC  1
00032 LC_TIME         2
00033 LC_COLLATE  3
00034 LC_MONETARY 4
00035 LC_MESSAGES 5
00036 LC_ALL          6
00037 */
00038 
00039 require('streams.php');
00040 require('gettext.php');
00041 
00042 
00043 // Variables
00044 
00045 global $text_domains, $default_domain, $LC_CATEGORIES, $EMULATEGETTEXT, $CURRENTLOCALE;
00046 $text_domains = array();
00047 $default_domain = 'messages';
00048 $LC_CATEGORIES = array('LC_CTYPE', 'LC_NUMERIC', 'LC_TIME', 'LC_COLLATE', 'LC_MONETARY', 'LC_MESSAGES', 'LC_ALL');
00049 $EMULATEGETTEXT = 0;
00050 $CURRENTLOCALE = '';
00051 
00052 
00053 // Utility functions
00054 
00058 function _get_reader($domain=null, $category=5, $enable_cache=true) {
00059     global $text_domains, $default_domain, $LC_CATEGORIES, $LC_MESSAGES;
00060     if (!isset($domain)) $domain = $default_domain;
00061     if (!isset($text_domains[$domain]->l10n)) {
00062         // get the current locale
00063         $locale = _setlocale($LC_MESSAGES, 0);
00064         $p = isset($text_domains[$domain]->path) ? $text_domains[$domain]->path : './';
00065         $path = $p . "$locale/". $LC_CATEGORIES[$category] ."/$domain.mo";
00066         if (file_exists($path)) {
00067             $input = new FileReader($path);
00068         } else {
00069             $input = null;
00070         }
00071         $text_domains[$domain]->l10n = new gettext_reader($input, $enable_cache);
00072     }
00073     return $text_domains[$domain]->l10n;
00074 }
00075 
00079 function locale_emulation() {
00080     global $EMULATEGETTEXT;
00081     return $EMULATEGETTEXT;
00082 }
00083 
00087 function _check_locale() {
00088     global $EMULATEGETTEXT;
00089     return !$EMULATEGETTEXT;
00090 }
00091 
00095 function _get_codeset($domain=null) {
00096     global $text_domains, $default_domain, $LC_CATEGORIES;
00097     if (!isset($domain)) $domain = $default_domain;
00098     return (isset($text_domains[$domain]->codeset))? $text_domains[$domain]->codeset : ini_get('mbstring.internal_encoding');
00099 }
00100 
00104 function _encode($text) {
00105     $source_encoding = function_exists('mb_detect_encoding')?mb_detect_encoding($text):'UTF-8';
00106     $target_encoding = _get_codeset();
00107     if ($source_encoding != $target_encoding && function_exists('mb_convert_encoding')) {
00108         return mb_convert_encoding($text, $target_encoding, $source_encoding);
00109     }
00110     else {
00111         return $text;
00112     }
00113 }
00114 
00115 // Custom implementation of the standard gettext related functions
00116 
00120 function _setlocale($category, $locale) {
00121     global $CURRENTLOCALE, $EMULATEGETTEXT;
00122     if ($locale === 0) { // use === to differentiate between string "0"
00123         if ($CURRENTLOCALE != '')
00124             return $CURRENTLOCALE;
00125         else
00126             // obey LANG variable, maybe extend to support all of LC_* vars
00127             // even if we tried to read locale without setting it first
00128             return _setlocale($category, $CURRENTLOCALE);
00129     } else {
00130         $ret = 1;
00131         if (($ret and $locale == '') or ($ret == $locale)) {
00132             $EMULATEGETTEXT = 0;
00133             $CURRENTLOCALE = $ret;
00134         } else {
00135         if ($locale == '') // emulate variable support
00136             $CURRENTLOCALE = getenv('LANG');
00137         else
00138             $CURRENTLOCALE = $locale;
00139             $EMULATEGETTEXT = 1;
00140         }
00141         return $CURRENTLOCALE;
00142     }
00143 }
00144 
00148 function _bindtextdomain($domain, $path) {
00149     global $text_domains;
00150     // ensure $path ends with a slash
00151     if ($path[strlen($path) - 1] != '/') $path .= '/';
00152     elseif ($path[strlen($path) - 1] != '\\') $path .= '\\';
00153     $text_domains[$domain]->path = $path;
00154 }
00155 
00159 function _bind_textdomain_codeset($domain, $codeset) {
00160     global $text_domains;
00161     $text_domains[$domain]->codeset = $codeset;
00162 }
00163 
00167 function _textdomain($domain) {
00168     global $default_domain;
00169     $default_domain = $domain;
00170 }
00171 
00175 function _gettext($msgid) {
00176     $l10n = _get_reader();
00177     //return $l10n->translate($msgid);
00178     return _encode($l10n->translate($msgid));
00179 }
00183 function __($msgid) {
00184     return _gettext($msgid);
00185 }
00189 function _ngettext($single, $plural, $number) {
00190     $l10n = _get_reader();
00191     //return $l10n->ngettext($single, $plural, $number);
00192     return _encode($l10n->ngettext($single, $plural, $number));
00193 }
00194 
00198 function _dgettext($domain, $msgid) {
00199     $l10n = _get_reader($domain);
00200     //return $l10n->translate($msgid);
00201     return _encode($l10n->translate($msgid));
00202 }
00206 function _dngettext($domain, $single, $plural, $number) {
00207     $l10n = _get_reader($domain);
00208     //return $l10n->ngettext($single, $plural, $number);
00209     return _encode($l10n->ngettext($single, $plural, $number));
00210 }
00211 
00215 function _dcgettext($domain, $msgid, $category) {
00216     $l10n = _get_reader($domain, $category);
00217     //return $l10n->translate($msgid);
00218     return _encode($l10n->translate($msgid));
00219 }
00223 function _dcngettext($domain, $single, $plural, $number, $category) {
00224     $l10n = _get_reader($domain, $category);
00225     //return $l10n->ngettext($single, $plural, $number);
00226     return _encode($l10n->ngettext($single, $plural, $number));
00227 }
00228 
00229 // Wrappers to use if the standard gettext functions are available, but the current locale is not supported by the system.
00230 // Use the standard impl if the current locale is supported, use the custom impl otherwise.
00231 
00232 function T_setlocale($category, $locale) {
00233     return _setlocale($category, $locale);
00234 }
00235 function T_bindtextdomain($domain, $path) {
00236     if (_check_locale()) return bindtextdomain($domain, $path);
00237     else return _bindtextdomain($domain, $path);
00238 }
00239 function T_bind_textdomain_codeset($domain, $codeset) {
00240     // bind_textdomain_codeset is available only in PHP 4.2.0+
00241     if (_check_locale() and function_exists('bind_textdomain_codeset')) return bind_textdomain_codeset($domain, $codeset);
00242     else return _bind_textdomain_codeset($domain, $codeset);
00243 }
00244 function T_textdomain($domain) {
00245     if (_check_locale()) return textdomain($domain);
00246     else return _textdomain($domain);
00247 }
00248 function T_gettext($msgid) {
00249     if (_check_locale()) return gettext($msgid);
00250     else return _gettext($msgid);
00251 }
00252 function T_($msgid) {
00253     if (_check_locale()) return _($msgid);
00254     return __($msgid);
00255 }
00256 function T_ngettext($single, $plural, $number) {
00257     if (_check_locale()) return ngettext($single, $plural, $number);
00258     else return _ngettext($single, $plural, $number);
00259 }
00260 function T_dgettext($domain, $msgid) {
00261     if (_check_locale()) return dgettext($domain, $msgid);
00262     else return _dgettext($domain, $msgid);
00263 }
00264 function T_dngettext($domain, $single, $plural, $number) {
00265     if (_check_locale()) return dngettext($domain, $single, $plural, $number);
00266     else return _dngettext($domain, $single, $plural, $number);
00267 }
00268 function T_dcgettext($domain, $msgid, $category) {
00269     if (_check_locale()) return dcgettext($domain, $msgid, $category);
00270     else return _dcgettext($domain, $msgid, $category);
00271 }
00272 function T_dcngettext($domain, $single, $plural, $number, $category) {
00273     if (_check_locale()) return dcngettext($domain, $single, $plural, $number, $category);
00274     else return _dcngettext($domain, $single, $plural, $number, $category);
00275 }
